name: Slice N Dice
description:
My GMTK Jam Entry 2022: Slice N Dice

You are a pizza delivery guy in a randomly generated city. Can you deliver all the slices before the time runs out?

This is my first ever jam and the first project I've completed!

Thanks to Mark and the whole GMTK community. This game might be a bit rubbish, but it feels great to finally complete something (and so quickly!).

Any feedback would be amazing, as this was very rushed and I'm new to this!
